publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3477 Ms Margaret Curran: Closing the Opportunity Gap—That the Parliament welcomes the document Closing the Opportunity Gap: Scottish Budget for 2003-06, which shows how the Executive’s spending plans, as set out in Building a Better Scotland – spending Proposals 2003-06: What the money buys, will deliver a better life for the most disadvantaged people and communities in Scotland and agrees that the Executive’s social justice spending plans for the next three years will improve outcomes for those people and communities, through investing in their homes and neighbourhoods.Supported by: Hugh Henry*
